mapper.update: update media set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NARROW_RESOURCE_ID = #{narrowResourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENLARGE_RESOURCE_ID = #{enlargeResourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, TENANT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TITLE, NARROW_RESOURCE_ID, ENLARGE_RESOURCE_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from media where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, TENANT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TITLE, NARROW_RESOURCE_ID, ENLARGE_RESOURCE_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from media
